title: Purchased Hextech Key and Chest, but it's not showing up on my Loot
body: I tried to log in and log out, but the newly purchased key and chest do not show up. Anyone else having this same problem?

replies.body:
Right now I'm seeing where you bought a key, used that key to open one chest that gave you a Gragas shard and 150 essence, then you upgraded Gragas to a permanent. After that, you bought only a single chest and I do see that chest in your loot at this point. 

Shoot me a quick screenshot of your loot if you still don't see it after refreshing your client again, sometimes if the store is really overloaded from purchases the content can take a couple min to show up.
I see the chest in my Loot now. Thanks for your help.
